channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How to watch Australia vs England: live stream 5th Ashes Test for *FREE* from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch 5th Ashes Test live streams for FREE from anywhere, as Australia and England face off in the series finale at Sydney Cricket Ground.

item.title: Someone made a ton of money betting on Maduro’s capture
item.description: Shortly before the US military launched an attack on Venezuela and captured President Nicolás Maduro, an account on Polymarket made some very suspiciously timed investments. The prediction market had been running bets on when or if Maduro would be removed from power, with prices for "out by January 31, 2026" as low as $0.07 late […]

item.title: The Core 9 Ultra 285K is Intel's fastest CPU and costs under $500 - so why is it so much cheaper compared to AMD $679 Ryzen 9 9950X3D?
item.description: Benchmark data places AMD’s Ryzen 9 9950X3D only slightly ahead of Intel’s cheaper and more efficient top desktop processor.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Turned Everyone Back Onto Prince
item.description: Gen Z or older, it doesn't matter: the two needle drops in 'Stranger Things' reignited interest in Prince's music catalog.

item.title: Bitfinex hacker Ilya Lichtenstein credits Trump for early release from prison
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein, who pled guilty to money laundering charges tied to his role in the massive hack of crypto exchange Bitfinex, has apparently been released early from prison.
